title: The War is over
creator_credit: Rene Bonniere, Malca Gillson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Depicts Canadian troops returning home by ship after the first World War and anticipates, in a narrative context, the problems of readjustment they will face centred around questions of authority, discipline, rules and regulations and the effects of war.
creator_credit_for_label: Rene Bonniere, Malca Gillson and National Film Board of Canada
